      private boolean ConstraintSearch.secondPrimeDegreeSearch(Triple previous, SearchMethod.Direction direction, int increment)
      Deprecated. 
      THIS IS NOT A FOR SURE SEARCH! DO NOT USE! A check to see if the searched at node cannot contain the sought after value. If it cannot, then we can limit the nodes for which can contain the value.
      private boolean ConstraintSearch.thirdDegreeSearch(Triple previous, SearchMethod.Direction direction, int increment)
